snippet: A battle between rival gangs inside a prison in northern Mexico left at least 31 inmates dead in the latest violence to erupt inside the country’s overcrowded penal institutions, local officials said on Wednesday.
abstract: Clashes between rival gangs inside a prison in northern Mexico leave at least 31 inmates dead in latest violence to erupt inside country’s overcrowded penal institutions.
lead_paragraph: A battle between rival gangs inside a prison in northern Mexico left at least 31 inmates dead in the latest violence to erupt inside the country’s overcrowded penal institutions, local officials said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Mexico: At Least 31 Inmates Are Killed in Prison Gang Riot
headline.print_headline: Mexico: At Least 31 Inmates Are Killed in Prison Gang Riot
